data.message: Writing for a young fan of yours he is 10 years old and his  name is Arlen Viera and he my son. I never thought I ever do this but first time for anything, I have found a letter made of notebook paper in my mail box today, and is meant for you Eminem and you will have never receive it at all if I have not post this to you. Am trying help my boy that sit down with my phone watching your video in youtube and fallows your lyrics almost everyday practicing rap. I wanted to share this with you cause you are his inspiration, what can a father do for his boy but to help him out when in need of support. So here the photo of his letter to you hope you can make it out.
